body_html:
OpenCL support is not official. Please reach out to CodePlay with the issue.
However, looking at their platform support notes, I do not see ubuntu 17, and I suspect that may be your issue.

body:
OpenCL support is not official. Please reach out to CodePlay with the issue.
However, looking at their platform support notes, I do not see ubuntu 17, and I suspect that may be your issue.
